extendedInfo.description: Line Dance Live Wallpaper is a 3D cube rendering of beautiful line shape wallpaper. First we selected some beautiful wallpaper of Line Art. We then make them into 3D cube and set them in motion. We later added 3D lighting effects and particle effects to make this a wonderful light show on your mobile phone. Options for transparent box2 different light sourceOption to move lightOption to change viewing angle and change background color.Option for Auto rotation with speed control, or manual control with finger swipe.
